brand_identity.name: ClipTag AI
brand_identity.mission: The most affordable AI video tool on the market.

headings.usage: All section headers, hero text, feature titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Paragraphs, UI labels, form inputs. High legibility.

code.usage: Timestamps, data values, pricing numbers, technical specs.

layout_system.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-8, p-12, p-16 for sections. p-6 for cards.

grids.marketing: Bento Grid (Tetris Mode). Asymmetrical columns (e.g., col-span-8 + col-span-4).
grids.dashboard: Control Room Grid. Dense, gap-4, full height panels.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF5F1F] text-black font-bold hover:bg-[#FF7A45] hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,95,31,0.4)] transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 text-white border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 hover:border-white/20

cards.style: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-[#27272A] hover:border-[#FF5F1F]/50 transition-colors duration-300

inputs.style: bg-[#121212] border border-[#27272A] focus:border-[#FF5F1F] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#FF5F1F] text-white placeholder:text-[#52525B]

navigation.style: Fixed top, glassmorphism (bg-black/70 backdrop-blur-lg), border-b border-white/5

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use 'primary.glow' behind key elements (Hero Image, CTA buttons).
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px borders are mandatory for hierarchy. Do not rely on shadows alone in dark mode.

image_urls.description: Dark creator workspace with neon accents. Use with heavy overlay.
Orange digital gradient/wave. Use for section backgrounds or masking.
Close up of audio/video controls. Use for 'Precision' feature section.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react'. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance. Color: #A1A1AA (default) or #FF5F1F (active).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install fonts 'Outfit', 'Manrope', 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Force dark mode in Tailwind config. Do not implement light mode toggle unless requested.
3. CLEANUP: Remove default React logos and App.css styles. Reset to a clean slate.
4. SHADCN: When installing Shadcn components, customize the 'slate' base to match our #050505 background.
5. PRICING: Emphasize the $7.99 price point with a glowing border or badge.
6. DASHBOARD: Sidebar navigation should be fixed left, dark grey (#0A0A0A). Main content area #050505.
7. TESTIDS: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark Mode Only: Do not use white backgrounds anywhere.
Contrast: Ensure text is #EDEDED on dark backgrounds, not #666.
Micro-interactions: All buttons must have a hover state (brightness up or border glow).
No Gradients on Text: Keep text solid white/grey for readability. Use gradients on borders or backgrounds only.
